metadata.title: RZ/V: What should I do when the booting procedure stops?

sections.content:
Question:
When I try to update the version of Linux, Linux stops while booting.
How can I get it to boot properly?
Answer:
Boot Loader and U-boot were written to the eMMC of the evaluation board.
If the version of the Boot Loader and U-boot are different from the version of the Linux Package, the Linux will not boot.
Please update the Boot Loader and U-boot using bundled in Linux Package that you use.
Suitable Products
RZ/V
